metadata.title: CVE-2020-35535 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In LibRaw, there is an out-of-bounds read vulnerability within the"LibRaw::parseSonySRF()" function (libraw\src\metadata\sony.cpp) whenprocessing srf files.

criterions.comment: ufraw package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
darktable package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
exactimage package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
dcraw package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
rawtherapee package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
kodi package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
